room_title: Escape room "The Surgery" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: We were a family group of 7. I have previously done an escape room at another venue. This company impressed me so much from start to finish. Top notch! Prices were reasonable. Easy to make reservations. Pleasant customer service (I called in twice with questions).We did the room "Surgery". Wasn't scary or gory which is what my teammates were concerned about. These rooms makes you use your critical thinking skills which we loved the challenge. Even though these rooms are not targeted towards younger kids, we had a 9-year-old who was right there playing in the game. We decided as a group to come back and conquer another room next month. Can't wait!!

room_title: Escape room "The Surgery" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: We did the Surgery Room and it was challenging and fun! We escaped, whew! Will definitely try the other rooms too! Such a great experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Surgery" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: My daughter and her friends really enjoyed the Operation room. It took them longer than I thought it would to escape. Great way to spend your birthday.

room_title: Escape room "The Surgery" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: I had a really good time tonight.. Such a great experience. The staff was extremely helpful and very nice.

room_title: Escape room "The Surgery" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: This was our first experience and we had a blast! The owners are super nice and we highly recommend this for families and friends!
